title: Living With Mia / My Sister Mia v1.1 [Inceton] [RPGM]
description:
Release date: 20.5.2018
Genre: RPG, 3DCG, Erotic Adventure, Sexy Girl, Big Tits, Big Ass, Family Sex, Brother-Sister, Voyeur
Platforms: Windows
Censorship: Yes (you have to enter "family" relation yourself when game beginning)
Language: English
Author: Inceton Games

plot
You the protagonist are a 18 year old that is about to finish highschool. You live with your Mother, Father and a hot Sister (Mia)
The game starts 2 days before the last day of school. You are behind in school and need to catch up on studying to pass. Your parents are going on a business trip to France for a weak. You are studying till late, your sister comes home and she is drunk. You try to take advantage of that.

This is third act (Act 3) of game. To get all clues, you have to play Act 1 (up to v0.4, My Sister Mia v0.4) and Act 2 (up to v 1.0full, My Sister Mia v1.0 full). Please note, that this is release is first release of Act, there is almost no content included, but still worth of playing ;)

Also note that game was renamed due patreons policy updates (prohibiting incest)
